def.name: No meningococcal primary series dose was administered

a:t.name: input

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Meningococcal vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 0

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: MenA conjugate vaccine, 1-dose schedule

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: MenA conjugate vaccine, 2-dose schedule (specific context where there is a compelling reason to vaccinate infants aged under 9 months)

a:t.value: Quadrivalent conjugate vaccines (A,C,W135,Y-CRM), 1-dose schedule

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: Polysaccharide vaccines schedule
